step_data.thought: The previous actions have attempted to navigate to and scroll into the reviews section, but the current page state does not show any direct link or element that can be focused or clicked to open the reviews. Given that the URL contains '#reviews', the reviews section should be present on the page. Therefore, I will click on the 'Reviews (4)' link to ensure the reviews are displayed.
